componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},

I would like to take a moment to introduce our Packaging Experts who will be staffing booth #1311 at Labelexpo Americas 2022 in Chicago from September 13th to the 15th. They will be available to discuss our packaging product line (below), the march toward sustainability in the global Packaging market and discuss pain points and solutions.

We invite you to stop by and have a conversation with our in-house experts. If you are not attending the show, please feel free to connect with them.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Dan Riendeau - Strategic Business Unit Manager; Packaging

Dan is a Strategic Business Unit Manager for the Packaging market. He is an MBA graduate from Nichols College and a proven leader in business development and product management. Dan has an extensive knowledge of market research, product strategy and competitive analysis.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Melissa David - Product Line Manager; Packaging

Melissa is a Project Manager for the Packaging Market. She is a graduate of Worcester Polytechnic Institute and brings 23 years of industry knowledge. Melissa is a member of the APR Olefin Technical Committee.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Introducing optiFLEX® ecoFOCUS™ HDPE for Recyclability of Containers

Help Customers Meet Their Sustainability Goals According to McKinsey & Company, consumers want plastic packaging to be recyclable or to include higher levels of recycled content. Recyclability Using a PE film on an HDPE container means you are pairing...
